hero27.subtitle: Whether it's a corporate party, gala or trade fair – with us your event becomes the highlight everyone talks about.

home.findArtistSubtitle: Answer just a few short questions and receive non-binding initial suggestions and prices.

cta.heading: PepeShows – more than just an artist agency
cta.description:
We create commercial shows, promote culture, and run our own base.
This way we combine experience, network, and passion – making PepeShows true experts for unforgettable experiences.

gallery23.headingDesktop: We don’t believe in average – with us it’s excellence.
gallery23.subtitle: We create moments that stay in your head and your heart.

gallery23.headingDesktop: We don’t believe in average – with us it’s excellence.
gallery23.subtitle: We create moments that stay in your head and your heart.

hero228.subtitle: We bring visions to the stage – professional, bespoke, and full of passion.

hero87.heading: Our Artists
hero87.body: Our artists come from renowned circus schools across Europe, and each one presents a unique way of expressing themselves on stage. Our network, however, spans the entire world. As the Pepe Collective, we train together regularly in Munich to ensure seamless transitions in our performances. If you’re not sure whether our artists fit your event, just visit us and get to know your favorite in person.

hero37.title: Full variety shows, solo acts, or tailor-made ensemble concepts.
hero37.subtitle: We curate and produce stage programs – from a 15-minute highlight to a full evening. We book solo artists directly; for groups we develop custom concepts including run-of-show, music, and costumes.

hero.title: Shows & formats – clearly planned, powerfully performed
hero.subtitle: From short show highlights to full-evening variety: we deliver the right size – including direction, music & costumes. Book solo acts directly or curated ensembles tailored to your event.

mission.body: Every event is unique – and that’s exactly how we design our concepts. Our goal: the perfect show for your occasion and a magical moment that lasts.

hero.title: Pepe – brand guidelines
hero.subtitle: This guide helps organizers, partners and the press represent Pepe consistently and professionally. Logos, colors, typography – plus examples and quick downloads.

logos.title: Logos
logos.subtitle: Primary logo in color, black, white & inverted. Always keep clear space, do not distort or rotate.

main.title: Primary logo
main.text: SVG for digital & print, PNG (transparent) for office/presentations.

inverted.title: Inverted
inverted.text: For dark backgrounds. Please avoid placing it on busy photos.

colors.title: Colors
colors.subtitle: Primary, secondary and neutrals – with HEX, RGB & CMYK values.

type.title: Typography
type.subtitle: Headlines and body copy – consistent for web & print.

headlines.title: Headlines
headlines.text: Futura Bold. Alternative: Nunito Sans Bold. Avoid excessive line height and negative tracking.

body.title: Body copy
body.text: Futura Regular. Alternative: Nunito Sans Regular. Ensure sufficient contrast for readability.

imagery.title: Imagery
imagery.subtitle: Dynamic, energetic, modern – action, motion and emotion.

tone.title: Voice & tone
tone.subtitle: Casual, direct, inviting – activating phrasing, no jargon.

do.title: Do
do.i2: Concise info with clear calls to action.

dont.title: Don't
dont.i1: Do not distort, rotate or add effects to the logo.
dont.i2: Do not place the logo on busy photos without a solid area.
dont.i3: Avoid overly formal language or jargon.

contact.title: Contact
contact.help: Questions about usage? We’re happy to help.

hero.title: PepeShows – press texts & info
hero.subtitle: World-class artistry – modern, energetic and perfectly organized. We turn events into magical experiences. All texts below are modular building blocks you can combine freely.

texts.title: Texts – short, medium, long
texts.subtitle: Flexible for websites, bookings, programs & press.

teaser.headline: Teaser
teaser.text: PepeShows stands for world-class artistry – modern, energetic and perfectly organized. From galas to corporate events and festivals: our shows transform spaces into magical experiences. From world champions to award-winning talents – the Pepe Collective brings together the best. Art becomes magic, and for a moment the everyday fades.

elevator.headline: Elevator pitch
elevator.text:
Since 2006, the Pepe Collective has stood for artistry that excites. With PepeShows, two friends joined forces to bring their craft to corporate stages – professional, uncomplicated and outstanding.

Our artists are among the world’s elite: a Cyr-wheel world champion, a seven-time juggling world champion, a BC One champion in breakdance and many more exceptional talents. Together we create shows that blend emotion and precision.

Whether a solo highlight after dinner, a 45-minute duo show or a full-evening variety performance like recently in Gütersloh: we stage events that last. We’ve already brought magic to the stage for brands like Porsche, Google, McDonald’s, AstraZeneca and festivals like Tollwood.

PepeShows makes artistry tangible – and lets audiences dream at the same time.

about.headline: About
about.text:
PepeShows – where artistry becomes magic.

Since 2006, the Pepe Collective has been synonymous with top-tier artistry. With PepeShows, Christoph Hermann and his team combine decades of experience to develop tailor-made show concepts for companies and events of all sizes.

Our philosophy: professional, uncomplicated, outstanding. We believe artistry is more than acrobatics. It moves, inspires and opens a window into another world. For a moment, the everyday disappears and art becomes magic.

Behind PepeShows are world champions and award-winning performers: a Cyr-wheel world champion, a seven-time juggling world champion, a BC One champion in breakdance – and many other international artists. Together we craft unique shows that unite energy, elegance and precision.

Our repertoire ranges from short solo acts and dynamic 45-minute duo shows to full-evening variety programs (e.g. a 5-hour variety for the city of Gütersloh). Everything is possible – from dinner highlights to festival performances, with a clear focus on corporate events.

For organizers we provide technical packages – sound, light and rider are flexible: the full technical rider as well as logos, header images, press photos and trailers can be found in the media material. PepeShows makes artistry tangible – and lets audiences dream.

formats.title: Formats & combinations
formats.subtitle: Examples – flexible to combine, specialized in corporate events.

solo.title: Solo highlights
solo.body: 7–10 minutes, ideal as a crisp program point – e.g. after dinner.

duo.title: Duo show (45 minutes)
duo.body: High-energy variety with a red thread – perfect for galas & stages.

formats.disciplinesNote: Disciplines (selection): Cyr wheel, juggling, aerial acrobatics, acrobatics, fire show, Chinese pole, magic, walking acts – each performed by proven professionals (incl. world champions and international champions).

audref.title: Audiences & references
audref.subtitle: B2B focus – corporate, gala, trade fair; equally strong with the public for festivals & theatres.

audiences.title: Audiences
audiences.i3: Audience: suitable for all age groups

tech.title: Tech & logistics
tech.subtitle: Short version – full details in the media material/technical rider.

rider.i2: Sound & light optionally bookable – happy to use on-site tech as well
